author: Peter Wright
content: That shape is just so beautiful.You can see it working and taking the weight out of a wave.

author: glenwood weather
content: I remember sitting in my high school history class, (back in the 1960’s) and our teacher telling us about Lewis and Clark spending the winter with the red haired Mandan Indians. Our teacher said the red hair came from the early Vikings who had settled in North America. I don’t know how correct that is, but it sure fascinated me at the time.
